title: Slow Cooker Salisbury Steak
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) envelope dry onion soup mix
1 (1 ounce) packet dry au jus mix
2 (10.75 oz) cancs condensed cream of chicken soup
directions: In a large bowl, mix together the ground beef, onion soupd mix, bread crumbs, and milk using your hands.
Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium high heat.
Dredge the patties in flour just enough to coat and quickly brown on both sides.
Place the browned patties into the slow cooker stacking alternately like a pyramid.
In a medium bowl, mix together the cream of chicken soup, au jus mix, and water. Pour over the mean.
Cook on low setting for 4 or 5 hours until ground beef is well done.
